title.en: Aspiration Written for Jamyang Tsultrim of Sakya Tsedong1

text.en: Through the compassion of the victorious ones and their heirs throughout the whole of space and time,
text.en-trans: chok dü gyalwa sé ché tukjé dang

text.en: And through the gurus, yidams, Dharma protectors, and wealth deities,
text.en-trans: lama yidam chökyong norlha yi

text.en: May all my thoughts and actions that accord with the Dharma
text.en-trans: dak gi chö dang tünpé samjor kün

text.en: Be accomplished without hindrance, just as I wish.
text.en-trans: gekmé yizhin drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: With a steadfast foundation of renunciation and discipline,
text.en-trans: ngejung tsultrim zhitsa rabtu ten

text.en: And altruistic love, compassion, and benevolence,
text.en-trans: zhenpen jam dang nyingjé jam sem dang

text.en: And devotion to the guru as stable as the king of mountains,
text.en-trans: lamar mögü rigyal tar tenpé

text.en: May I keep my vows and pledges perfectly pure.
text.en-trans: dom dang damtsik nampar dakpar shok

text.en: However these appearances arise, they are my own mind.
text.en-trans: jitar nangwa didak rang gi sem

text.en: My mind has always been free from arising, ceasing, and remaining.
text.en-trans: rangsem döné kyegak né sum dral

text.en: Its fundamental nature is clarity, awareness, and emptiness inseparable.
text.en-trans: salrik tongsum yermé neluk shi

text.en: May I actualize the view that is beyond expression.
text.en-trans: jödral tawa ngön du jepar shok

text.en: Through exerting myself in the profound yogas of the four empowerments
text.en-trans: zabmo kyé dang dzokpé rimpa yi

text.en: Of the profound generation and completion stages,
text.en-trans: wang zhi naljor zabmor tsönpa lé

text.en: May obscurations be purified and the wisdom of the four kāyas actualized,
text.en-trans: drib dak ku zhi yeshe ngön du gyur

text.en: And may I capture the sovereign stronghold of the fruition.
text.en-trans: drebu gyalpö tsensa zinpar shok

text.en: In short, throughout all meditation and post-meditation periods,
text.en-trans: dorna nyamjé küntu tamal gyi

text.en: Without succumbing to the extensive confusion of the ordinary,
text.en-trans: trulpa gya jam wang du ma shorwar

text.en: And never parting from the vital point of practising the view
text.en-trans: khordé yermé tawé nyamlen gyi

text.en: Of the inseparability of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa, may wisdom dawn.
text.en-trans: né dang dralmé yeshe charwar shok

text.en: May I be guided and cared for by the guru in all my lives,
text.en-trans: tserab küntu lamé jesu zung

text.en: May I never stray from the conduct of the bodhisattvas,
text.en-trans: changchub chö lé namyang mi da zhing

text.en: And by constantly applying mindfulness, vigilance and conscientiousness,
text.en-trans: dren shé bakyö gyündu tenpa dang

text.en: May I exert myself for the sake of sentient beings.
text.en-trans: drowa semchen dön rab tsönpar shok
